attributes.action: ban tractors from driving on A roads between the hours of 8am-10am and 4pm-6pm Monday to Friday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often are our roads clogged with congestion, much of this unavoidable due to the volume of traffic.  Tractors, however, could carry out their business outside of peak times, freeing up the roads for commuters driving to and from work. Is it right that, once again, the rights of farmers should hold sway over the rest of us?  I think not.
